vulnerabilities.title: jSuites subect to Cross-site Scripting
vulnerabilities.description: Versions of the package jsuites before 5.0.1 are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) due to improper user-input sanitization in the Editor() function.

vulnerabilities.title: Clipboard-based XSS
vulnerabilities.description:
### Impact
XSS against the user.

### Details
jsuites is vulnerable to DOM based XSS if the user can be tricked into copying _anything_ from a malicious and pasting it into the html editor. This is because a part of the clipboard content is directly written to `innerHTML` causing XSS.

### References
The Curious Case of Copy & Paste â€“ on risks of pasting arbitrary content in browsers: https://research.securitum.com/the-curious-case-of-copy-paste/
